nodes.text: Docking Bay B-04 was a docking bay in the Dromund Kaas spaceport. During the Cold War, it was once used by a Neimoidian smuggler to dock his D5-Mantis Patrol Craft. Despite Tarro Blood's warning of the docking bay staff, a bounty hunter killed the security officers and the smuggler and stole the ship as part of a tradition in the Great Hunt, taking ownership of the ship.
